duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing maintenance on municipal well pump systems and rehabilitating water wells.
Troubleshooting and repairing mechanical and electrical components of well systems.
Servicing, installation, and inspections of submersible turbine pumps.
Operating a hydraulic truck crane and/or pump hoist as needed.
Maintaining all tools and equipment and safely transporting equipment/trucks to worksite locations.
Documenting work and providing accurate record-keeping of all inspections and maintenance activities.

education_certification.credential: Valid Class A CDL with a clean and safe driving record.
Experience with industrial and/or municipal water wells and pumps preferred but not required.
Experience with electricity, controls, and troubleshooting motors/pumps a plus.
Naturally motivated and self-driven with the ability to maintain effective professional relationships with customers and co-workers.
Ability to work outdoors in all seasons/weather and in long variable hours.
Proper implementation of safety practices and use of all required PPE.
Physically fit and able to lift 50 lbs. or more repeatedly.
